extendedInfo.description: Defense shooting action armed with splendid effects - Zombie Street DefenseBuild a stronghold and rescue your colleagues by escaping from the city occupied by zombies! â Desperate struggle against zombies to escape from the zombie city.- Alone in the city, you have only one pistol! - Buy weapons and mercenaries and upgrade, and you can block the endless zombies.â High quality graphic.- Natural animation characters and splendid shooting action.- Graphic displaying beautiful and characteristic city background every place.- The splendid effect of shooting.- Powerful effect of blowing the zombies off.â Rhythmic BGM and realistic weaponry effects.- Rhythmic BGM cannot be missed in the desperate struggle against zombies.- Realistic and exciting shooting effects of each weapon.â The five types of extraordinary weapons which will protect you.- The five types of extraordinary weapons necessary for your survival.- All weapons contain powerful hitting impact.- As you go on, you can obtain more powerful weapon.â 4 trustworthy comrades who will support you.- 4 comrades with great styles.- Each uses extraordinary weapon helping you.- Playing the game, you will meet new comrades, and you can kill the zombies with them.â Special skills provided to overcome crisis.- Special skills are supported to settle the crisis in one shot.- If you are in a dangerous situation surrounded zombies, letâs use the air bombardment.â Upgrade system giving various fun.- About 20 types of extraordinary upgrades provided.- Numerous factors such as weapon and mercenaries, special weapon, barricade, and etc can be provided.- Letâs see how stronger you become through steady upgrade.

reviews.title: Ok game. Very greedy.
reviews.comment: The upgrade costs are outrageous. You could easily spend hundreds of dollars or weeks repeating the same boring grind to unlock this painfully repititous game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This is a lot better than most defense games. The upgrade cost for the team could be a lot cheaper & the base upgraded could be cooler for the last upgrade I was expecting something with barb wire to cause damage to the zombies who managed to get close. All in all its a great game I would love to see a part 2 to this story. What happens after they get on the helicopter? Do they find peace or is there more hell on earth?!

reviews.title: Awesome but

I kip on playng though it force closes but im also concern at my phone cuz it might get damage or smthing. Am rating it 5 stars for u to fix d problm. And i hope its worth it. Thanks. By the way am using samsung galaxy y.
